'''''Ring Finger - Dowsing Rope''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete all 3 [[Warrior's Challenge]]s in the [[Coatepec Mountain]] with a grade of SS.

==Gameplay Notes==
The challenges can be started by talking to [[Lirio]] in [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]], [[Manzana]] and [[Cima]] in [[Coatepec Mountain]].
